channel.title: drawFriendsListOrWelcome

item.title: drawFriendsListOrWelcome
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

In that method ^ I see things like

if(j == 204){ if(maxStats[0] < 99){ class9.disabledMessage = "Attack: "+currentStats[0]+"/"+maxStats[0]+"\\nCurrent XP: "+currentExp[0]+"\\nNext level: "+getXPForLevel(maxStats[0]+1)+"\\nRemainder: "+(getXPForLevel(maxStats[0]+1) - currentExp[0]); return; } else { class9.disabledMessage = "Attack: "+currentStats[0]+"/"+maxStats[0]+"\\nExperience: "+currentExp[0]; return; } }

I need to add in a new skill in there, but I have no idea how to assign j.

This is in rsinterface ^

I suck client sided, so yeah if you could help me that would be great.
Thanks.

Read full topic
